name: The Axe of Kolt (Lazzah)
description:
You are a penniless ex-mercenary soldier, wandering the land looking for somewhere to put down some roots. You arrrive in a village called Hengmire and learn that a horde of lizardmen - the Xixon - have invaded a nearby kingdom, Hecate, bent on revenge for their defeat many years ago. The only thing that can save Hecate is a lost axe that has special powers.

Can you find the lost axe and save Hecate from destruction at the hands of the Xixon?
